title: Nuclear Physics Energy Spectra (NPESv1)
description: JSON Schema to store nuclear physics spectrum data. Mostly used for gamma spectroscopy.

schemaVersion.description: Version string of the JSON Schema used.
schemaVersion.title: Schema Version

deviceName.description: The name of the recording device.

softwareName.description: The name of the software that is used for recording with some additional version information

DeviceData.title: Device Data
DeviceData.description: Metadata and other information about the recording device.

startTime.description: Date and time of the recording start, ISO-formatted. Depends on 'endTime'!

endTime.description: Date and time of the recording end, ISO-formatted. Depends on 'startTime'!

ResultData.title: Result Data
ResultData.description: The resulting measurement data from recording.

numberOfChannels.description: The number of channels or bins in the histogram.

validPulseCount.description: The number of total valid pulses in the spectrum, i.e. (total counts - invalid counts).

items.description: A single histogram bin from the spectrum.

spectrum.description: The complete energy spectrum as an array of individual bins.

EnergySpectrum.title: Energy Spectrum
EnergySpectrum.description: Contains all the data specific to the (background) energy spectrum.

polynomialOrder.description: Order of the polynomial used for calibration, e.g. order 2 for a + bx +cx^2., i.e. number of coefficients minus 1.

items.description: An individual calibration coefficient; can be any float.

coefficients.description: All the coefficients needed for the n-poly calibration, sorted from lowest to highest order.

EnergyCalibration.title: Energy Calibration
EnergyCalibration.description: All the data used for energy calibration of the spectrum.

location.description: Location where the sample was collected.

time.description: Date and time when the sample was collected, ISO-formatted.

weight.description: Weight of the sample in grams; can be any float.

volume.description: Volume of the sample in cubic centimeters; can be any float.

note.description: Some other arbitrary notes on the sample.

SampleInfo.title: Sample Info
SampleInfo.description: All the data surrounding the sample itself.
